selectAndWaitselect_moduleAccounts
clickAndWaitFolder_show:method
clickAndWaitlink=Receivable
clickAndWait//img[@alt=\'Grouping Reference Fast Input\']
verifyValuefield_your_groupingoff
clickfield_your_grouping
clickAndWait//input[@id="dialog_update_button"]
assertPortalStatusMessageUpdated
verifyValuefield_your_groupingon
verifyText//fieldset[2]/div/div/span0.00
verifySelectedLabelfield_your_node41 - Receivable
verifyText//span[@id=\'listbox_record_number\']4 record(s)
click//tr[@id=\'listbox_data_line_3\']/td[1]/input
clickAndWait//input[@id="dialog_update_button"]
assertPortalStatusMessageUpdated
verifyText//fieldset[2]/div/div/span2 200.00
clickAndWait//input[@id="dialog_submit_button"]
assertPortalStatusMessageNothing matches
verifyText//fieldset[2]/div/div/span2 200.00
click//tr[@id=\'listbox_data_line_2\']/td[1]/input
clickAndWait//input[@id="dialog_update_button"]
assertPortalStatusMessageUpdated
verifyText//fieldset[2]/div/div/span0.00
clickAndWait//input[@id="dialog_submit_button"]
assertPortalStatusMessage2 Lines Grouped
open${base_url}/AccountingZuite_markChanged
verifyTextPresentDone.
open${base_url}/Zuite_waitForActivities
verifyTextPresentDone.
open${base_url}

assertElementPresent//tr[@id=\'listbox_data_line_0\']/td[6]/a/text()
assertElementPresent//tr[@id=\'listbox_data_line_1\']/td[6]/a/text()
click//tr[@id=\'listbox_data_line_1\']/td[1]/input
clickAndWait//input[@id="dialog_submit_button"]

click//tr[@id=\'listbox_data_line_0\']/td[1]/input
clickAndWait//input[@id="dialog_submit_button"]
